favorites.notLoginDescription: Please log in to access your favorites list.
favorites.noFavoritesFoundDescription: You can add food or drinks to your favorites list by clicking the heart icon on the product detail page.
favorites.reviewDescription: Share your thoughts about this product with other customers. Your feedback helps us improve our offerings.

alerts.emptyBudgetText: Please fill in the budget before saving preferences.
alerts.maxMainCategoryText: You can only select 2 main category.
alerts.invalidBudgetText: Budget must be between Rp.20,000 and Rp.{{maxPrice}}.

dashboard.description: This is your central workspace—easily manage ingredients, update your product listings, monitor availability, and access essential tools to streamline your daily operations.

partner.description: Manage partners in your application. Add, edit, or delete partners as needed.
partner.deleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this partner? This action cannot be undone.

home.noReviews: No reviews available yet. Be the first to write a review!
home.shareExperience: If you’ve tried this product, share your thoughts with other customers

navbar.searchPlaceholder: Search for products, ingredients, or categories...

user.description: Manage your account settings, update your profile information, and change your password.
user.deleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this user? This action cannot be undone.

stand.description: Manage stands in your application. Add, edit, or delete stands as needed.
stand.deleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this stand? This action cannot be undone.

role.description: Manage roles in your application. Add, edit, or delete roles as needed.
role.deleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this role? This action cannot be undone.

ingredient.description: Manage ingredients in your application. Add, edit, or delete ingredients as needed.
ingredient.deleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this ingredient? This action cannot be undone.

category.description: Manage categories in your application. Add, edit, or delete categories as needed.
category.deleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this Category? This action cannot be undone.

product.description: Manage products in your application. Add, edit, or delete products as needed.
product.deleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this product? This action cannot be undone.

profile.pleaseLoginToAccessYourProfile: Please login to access your profile.
profile.updateProfileInformationDescription: Update your account's profile information and email address.
profile.updatePasswordError: An error occurred while updating the password. Please try again.
profile.updatePasswordDescription: Ensure your account is using a long, random password to stay secure.
profile.deleteAccountDescription: Once your account is deleted, all of its resources and data will be permanently deleted. Before deleting your account, please download any data or information that you wish to retain.
profile.deleteAccountConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.
